mapper.select: SELECT l.lecture_no, s.* FROM Lecture l LEFT JOIN Student_lecture sl ON l.lecture_no = sl.lecture_no LEFT JOIN Student s ON sl.student_no = s.student_no WHERE lecture_no = #{lecture_no}
SELECT l.*, t.ta_no FROM Lecture l LEFT JOIN Ta t ON l.ta_no = t.ta_no
mapper.update: UPDATE Lecture SET lecture_name = #{lecture_name}, lecture_type = #{lecture_type}, ta_no = #{ta_no}, WHERE lecture_no = #{lecture_no}
